Title: Verify user can Login with valid credentials
Preconditions: User is on the Sauce Demp Login page
Test Steps:
1. Enter a valid username
2. Enter a valid password
3. Click the Login button
Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and is redirected to the products page
Actual Result: User is successfully logged in and is redirected to the products page

Title: Verify Login fails with invalid username
Preconditions: User is on the Sauce Demo Login Page
Test Steps:
1. Enter an invalid username
2. Enter a valid password
3. Click the Login button
Expected Result: User should get error message on screen indicating invalid credentials
Actual Result: User should get error message on screen indicating invalid credentials

Title: Verify Login fails with invalid password
Preconditions: User is on the Sauce Demo Login Page
Test Steps:
1. Enter a valid username
2. Enter an invalid password
3. Click the Login button
Expected Result: User should get error message on screen indicating invalid credentials
Actual Result: User should get error message on screen indicating invalid credentials

Title: Verify Login fails when username field is empty
Preconditions: User is on the Sauce Demo Login Page
Test Steps:
1. Leave username text field empty
2. Enter a valid password
3. Click the Login button
Expected Result: User should get error message on screen indicating invalid credentials
Actual Result: User should get error message on screen indicating invalid credentials

Title: Verify Login fails when password field is empty
Preconditions: User is on the Sauce Demo Login Page
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid username
2. Leave password text field empty
3. Click the Login button
Expected Result: User should get error message on screen indicating invalid credentials
Actual Result: User should get error message on screen indicating invalid credentials

Title: Verify products are added to cart when selected
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo and be redirected to products page
Test Steps:
1. Add an item to cart
2. Verify item appears in cart
3. Verify price displayed on product is the same as price in cart
Expected Result: Products added to cart from product page should appear in the shopping cart
Actual Result: Products added to cart from product page should appear in the shopping cart

Title: Verify cart displays fixed quantities for items added
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo and be redirected to products page
Test Steps:
1. Click “add to cart” on one or more product items
2. Click the Cart icon to be redirected to cart page
3. Observe quantity display of cart items
4. Attempt to modify quantity of item
Expected Result: Products in cart should all display a quantity of “1”. Quantity cannot be modified.
Actual Result: Products in cart should all display a quantity of “1”. Quantity cannot be modified.

Title: Verify products in cart remain in cart when website is refreshed
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo and be redirected to products page
Test Steps:
1. Click “add to cart” on one or more product items
2. Refresh webpage
Expected Result: Products added to cart should still be in cart after website is refreshed
Actual Result: Products added to cart should still be in cart after website is refreshed

Title: Verify products in product page can be clicked for additional photos and details
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo and be redirected to products page
Test Steps:
1. Select product from product page
2. Verify redirection to specific product page
3. Verify the product details are accurate to the product you selected
Expected Result: User is redirected to new page giving product images and details
Actual Result: User is redirected to new page giving product images and details

Title: Verify products can be removed from cart
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo and be redirected to products page
Test Steps:
1. Click “add to cart” on one or more product items
2. Click the Cart icon to be redirected to cart page
3. Remove products from cart with Remove button
Expected Result: Products that were added to cart are no longer there
Actual Result: Products that were added to cart are no longer there

Title: Verify checkout is disabled when cart is empty
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo and be redirected to products page
Test Steps:
1. Empty cart of all products
2. Select cart button
3. Verify users cannot click the checkout button when the cart is empty
Expected Result: Checkout button should be disabled when the cart is empty
Actual Result: Checkout button should be disabled when the cart is empty

Title: Verify the product sorting buttons will correctly sort the product items
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo and be redirected to products page
Test Steps:
1. Use the product sort button to sort products 
2. Look at products to confirm products are sorted in the order requested 
3. Use all sort options to confirm
Expected Result: Products should be sorted in each option correctly
Actual Result: Products should be sorted in each option correctly

Title: Verify all products are visible and available on Product page
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo and be redirected to products page
Test Steps:
1. Observe all product items listed on the Products page
2. Count the number of products displayed
3. Verify that each expected product is listed and selectable
Expected Result: All products should be visible on Product page and can be Added to the Cart
Actual Result: All products should be visible on Product page and can be Added to the Cart

Title: Verify product descriptions are accurate
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo and be redirected to products page
Test Steps:
1. Observe the description for each product listed on the Products page
2. Click on a product to navigate to the product details page
3. Verify that the product description on the details page matches the description on the Products page
Expected Result: Product descriptions are displayed and consistent across the Products page and product details page
Actual Result: Product descriptions are displayed and consistent across the Products page and product details page

Title: Verify product pricing display is accurate
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo and be redirected to products page
Test Steps:
1. Observe the price displayed for each product on the Products page
2. Click on a product to navigate to the product details page
3. Verify that the price displayed on the product details page matches the price shown on the Products page
Expected Result: Product pricing is visible and consistent on Products page and product detail page
Actual Result: Product pricing is visible and consistent on Products page and product detail page

Title: Verify user can checkout with valid first name, last name, and zip code
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo, add items to cart and proceed to checkout
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid first name, last name, and zip code
2. Select “continue”
Expected Result: User should be able to proceed to the checkout overview
Actual Result: User should be able to proceed to the checkout overview

Title: Verify error message when leaving first name text box blank
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo, add items to cart and proceed to checkout
Test Steps:
1. Leave First name box empty
2. Enter valid last name 
3. Enter valid zip code
4. Select continue
Expected Result: Error message is displayed on screen indicating the required field is missing. User cannot proceed until the field is completed.
Actual Result: Error message is displayed on screen indicating the required field is missing. User cannot proceed until the field is completed.

Title: Verify error message when leaving last name text box blank
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo, add items to cart and proceed to checkout
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid first name
2. Leave last name text box empty
3. Enter valid zip code
4. Select continue
Expected Result: Error message is displayed on screen indicating the required field is missing. User cannot proceed until the field is completed.
Actual Result: Error message is displayed on screen indicating the required field is missing. User cannot proceed until the field is completed.

Title: Verify error message when leaving zipcode text box blank
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo, add items to cart and proceed to checkout
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid first name
2. Enter valid last name
3. Leave zipcode text box blank
4. Select continue
Expected Result: Error message is displayed on screen indicating the required field is missing. User cannot proceed until the field is completed.
Actual Result: Error message is displayed on screen indicating the required field is missing. User cannot proceed until the field is completed.

Title: Verify price total is accurate
Preconditions: Successfully login to Sauce Demo, add items to cart and proceed to checkout. Enter valid information for first and last name, and zipcode. Select continue button
Test Steps:
1. Add total price of items in cart
2. Verify that total price matches
Expected Result: Total price should be accurate
Actual Result: Total price should be accurate

Title: Verify user can Logout of session
Preconditions: Succesfully Login to Sauce Demo
Test Steps:
1. Select Menu tab in upper left corner of application
2. Select “Logout” button
Expected Result: User should be successfully Logged out of their session
Actual Result: User should be successfully Logged out of their session
